title: South Korea : e-commerce sales volume 2009 to 2018
yAxis: E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won
summary: Overall E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won has increased over the Year.
E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won, of value 113.73 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won, of value 64.91 was reported at Year 2016
min_summary: In general E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won has rose over the Year.
